alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, southeastern Alachua, western Marion, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orange Heights to near Rainbow Lakes Estates. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Interlachen, Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Sparr, Florahome, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek and Orange Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam
